Experience

Click on a box for more details

Penn State College of Engineering,
State College,
PA
Research Intern, MCREU Scholars Program
April 2024 - July 2024

Worked on a research project with my Professor alongside a Doctor from Hershey Medical where our main goal was to develop an iOS application for delivering accurate conversational translations between doctors and non-English speaking patients.
This involved using Meta's SeamlessM4T-v2 Natural Language Processing model into an iOS application.

We used Python's transformers for the NLP model itself, and successfully containerized the entire environment using Docker for our API deployment.
Custom API endpoints were made possible using Gunicorn for production with Flask. AWS SageMaker, S3 bucket, and an EC2 instance all played big roles in the deployment process. Using TestFlight for our beta testers helped get valuable user feedback.

Penn State Housing and Food Services,
Middletown,
PA
Operations Analyst 1
Aug 2024 - Present

Initially, building Power Automate flows and automating data updates using JavaScript helped in setting a baseline for more efficient and reliable tools.
Introducing Git version control for the Inventory Management System was a key factor for improving collaboration.
Eventually, we decided it was time to migrate to Node.js for out backend servers and mySQL for our database.

Penn State IT Services,
Middletown,
PA
IT Services Student Team Manager
June 2022 - Present

Working as an IT Student Team Manager has helped improve my problem solving and leadership skills. Having assisted over 250 students and faculty members, it is interesting to see what new issues will come up and how you can solve them.
As a team, our core duties involve managing university technology infrastructure, where we ensure the systems are up to date and working properly.
Deployed and verified over 500+ Penn State computers using a specially built Operating System used explicitly by Penn State.
We use ServiceNow as our ticket management tool which allows us to upkeep all of our tasks and incidents helping other team members stay up to speed.

ADDR LLC,
Harrisburg,
PA
Software Engineer
Dec 2024 - Present

A technology startup with a focus in developing innovative autonomous drone solutions for various real world challenges and use cases. Find out more on our website.

For work experience, I have designed the website and it is maintained by me. I used Three.js for the 3D modelling and JavaScript.

Swan Softech Pvt Ltd,
Raipur,
India
Full Stack Developer Intern
April 2022 – Sept 2022

Collaborated with senior developers to implement a 17% more efficient file tracking system using Python and Angular.
Tasks included data preprocessing and the migration to an SQL database managed by PHPmyadmin. Understadning the strcuture and the functionailty gave a solid foundation for Object Oriented programming and fluency in writing production ready code.
Introducing proper versioning into the API helped improve its repsonse time as well. Unit Tests were written in pytest, it made it quite easy for debugging code and resolving minor issues to ensure optimal performance.
